title: Banco do Brasil Americas Ranks as One of Florida's Top Banks
text:
July 23, 2015 12:00 ET Banco do Brasil Americas Ranks as One of Florida's Top Banks 
MIAMI, FL--(Marketwired - Jul 23, 2015) - Banco do Brasil Americas has established itself as a prestigious banking authority in South Florida and has risen to become the 82 nd largest bank in the state. As confirmation of their strength and security, Banco do Brasil Americas has been rated in the 2015 Top 200 Healthiest Banks in America. As one of only 6 banks named in Florida and 2 named in Miami, Banco do Brasil Americas reconfirms the reputation as a reliable and solid banking source for consumers. Ranking requirements are based on risk percentages, deposit growth and capitalization, warranting an overall comprehensive analysis and giving a compelling assurance to clients. 
"Banco do Brasil Americas offers its clients top of the line services and is focused on being a strong performer in the financial institution sector throughout Florida and the US," says Antonio Cassio Segura, CEO of BB Americas. "We are honored to be included as one of the top healthiest banks in America and continue to strive for excellence." 
Banco do Brasil, the oldest and largest bank in South America, was founded in 1808 and has expanded to operate successful branches worldwide. Establishing themselves in Florida in 1986, the formidable institution is headquartered in Miami and has grown to 6 prestigious locations extending to Boca Raton. 
Banco do Brasil Americas is consistently seeking to improve its outstanding status of excellence and quality and expand its services and innovative approach for domestic and international clients. This banking powerhouse strives to streamline their old world reputation into becoming a consistent driving force in the South Florida financial sphere. Banco do Brasil Americas will continue to offer the ultimate in elite customer service and distinction through the best and most innovative tools available, creating an incomparable banking experience backed by a pristine reputation and years of financially sound business savvy. 
For more information about Banco do Brasil Americas visit www.bbamericas.com . 
About Banco do Brasil Americas For over 200 years, Banco do Brasil SA has offered high standard products and services to customers in Latin America and in over 24 countries worldwide. In 2012, the bank expanded its model of quality and service to the US market. Banco do Brasil Americas was opened to deliver innovative solutions with personalized service in English, Portuguese and Spanish. The financial services we offer include personal and business checking, savings, and money market accounts; CDs; debit, prepaid, and credit cards; and domestic and international funds transfers. We also offer a full line of residential and commercial loans for all of our clients' banking needs. In addition to providing the high-quality products and services that have made Banco do Brasil SA a trusted name throughout the world, Banco do Brasil Americas continues the proud tradition of its parent company through supporting local education, culture, and sports through community outreach, financial support, and volunteer work.
